demolition

类 Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      boolean bottom1Wall
      Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the bottom two units where the bomb is located, the default is false
      int bottom1Y
      The bottom position of the two units from the bomb's location (Y value)
      boolean bottom2Wall
      Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the bottom one units where the bomb is located, the default is false
      int bottom2Y
      The bottom position of the one units from the bomb's location (Y value)
      boolean bottomBrokenWall
      Used to determine whether there is a Broken wall at the bottom of the bomb's location, the default is false
      boolean explosion
      Used to determine whether the explosion occurred, the default is false
      processing.core.PImage explosionBottomSprite
      Image when the bomb exploded

      Used to record the frame value when the bomb was placed

      Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the left two units where the bomb is located, the default is false

      The left position of the two units from the bomb's location (X value)

      Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the left one units where the bomb is located, the default is false
      int left2X
      The left position of the one units from the bomb's location (X value)
      boolean leftBrokenWall
      Used to determine whether there is a Broken wall at the left of the bomb's location, the default is false
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> locationX
      Used to store the location of the bomb explosion range (X value)
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> locationY
      Used to store the location of the bomb explosion range (Y value)
      double period
      Used to calculate the period of the explosion
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> removeBrokenWallList
      Used to store the location of the Broken Wall that was blown up by the bomb
      boolean right1Wall
      Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the right two units where the bomb is located, the default is false
      int right1X
      The right position of the two units from the bomb's location (X value)
      boolean right2Wall
      Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the right one units where the bomb is located, the default is false
      int right2X
      The right position of the one units from the bomb's location (X value)
      boolean rightBrokenWall
      Used to determine whether there is a Broken wall at the right of the bomb's location, the default is false

      Images of bombs

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Bomb()
      Constructor for a Bomb
      Bomb(int x, int y)
      Constructor for a Bomb, requires the location of the bomb (X and Y value)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void draw(App app, processing.core.PImage sprite)
      This method is used to draw the image when the bomb explodes in the window of the app At the same time, the explosion range and the images caused by them (if blocked by a solid wall or destroyed by a broken wall) will be drawn at the same time.
      void drawBomb(App app)
      This method is used to draw the image of the bomb (before the explosion) in the window of the app There is a timer to calculate the period of bomb image loading
      int getX()
      This method is used to return the x value of the current position of the bomb
      int getY()
      This method is used to return the y value of the current position of the bomb
      void haveWall(App app)
      This method is used to determine whether there is a solid wall or a Broken Wall in the explosion range of the bomb If there is a solid wall, part of the image at the time of the explosion will not be displayed If there is a broken wall, destroy it (Add it to the list of storage to be destroyed)
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> loadLocation(App app)
      This method loads the position of the explosion range according to the position of the bomb (including X and Y values) The x and y values of the explosion range will be stored in their respective lists The list of stored x values will be combined with the list of stored y values
      void rangeExplosion(App app)
      This method determines the scope of the explosion (data provided by a list storing X and Y values) Within a certain period of time, the bomb will explode and will destroy the Broken Wall (if there is a broken wall) When an explosion occurs, if bombGuy is within the explosion range, it will lose one life
      void setSprite(App app)
      This method is used to load the image required by the bomb in the app and the image required when it explodes

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Bomb

        public Bomb()
        Constructor for a Bomb

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int x,
            int y)
        Constructor for a Bomb, requires the location of the bomb (X and Y value)
        参数:
        x - the location of the bomb (X value)
        y - the location of the bomb (Y value)

    • 方法详细资料

      • setSprite

        public void setSprite(App app)
        This method is used to load the image required by the bomb in the app and the image required when it explodes
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • haveWall

        public void haveWall(App app)
        This method is used to determine whether there is a solid wall or a Broken Wall in the explosion range of the bomb If there is a solid wall, part of the image at the time of the explosion will not be displayed If there is a broken wall, destroy it (Add it to the list of storage to be destroyed)
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • loadLocation

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> loadLocation(App app)
        This method loads the position of the explosion range according to the position of the bomb (including X and Y values) The x and y values of the explosion range will be stored in their respective lists The list of stored x values will be combined with the list of stored y values
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program
        返回:
        location

      • rangeExplosion

        public void rangeExplosion(App app)
        This method determines the scope of the explosion (data provided by a list storing X and Y values) Within a certain period of time, the bomb will explode and will destroy the Broken Wall (if there is a broken wall) When an explosion occurs, if bombGuy is within the explosion range, it will lose one life
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • drawBomb

        public void drawBomb(App app)
        This method is used to draw the image of the bomb (before the explosion) in the window of the app There is a timer to calculate the period of bomb image loading
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • draw

        public void draw(App app,
                 processing.core.PImage sprite)
        This method is used to draw the image when the bomb explodes in the window of the app At the same time, the explosion range and the images caused by them (if blocked by a solid wall or destroyed by a broken wall) will be drawn at the same time.
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program
        sprite - Explosion image

      • getX

        public int getX()
        This method is used to return the x value of the current position of the bomb
        返回:
        x

      • getY

        public int getY()
        This method is used to return the y value of the current position of the bomb
        返回:
        y
